text:
Red, green, yellow or blue? What´s your favourite
colour?

Red, green, yellow or blue? What´s your favourite
colour?

I like red. I like red. I like red. Red´s
my favourite colour.

Do you like red? Oh yes I do!
I like red. Red´s my favourite colour.

But do you like light or dark, light or dark,
like or dark red?

Light or dark, light or dark, light or dark
red?

I like dark red. Dark red. Dark red is my
favourite colour.

I like blue. I like blue. I like blue. Blue´s
my favourite colour.

Do you like blue? Oh yes I do!
I like blue. Blue´s my favourite colour.

But do you like light or dark, light or dark,
like or dark blue?

Light or dark, light or dark, light or dark
blue?

I like light blue. Light blue. Light blue
is my favourite colour.

Oh Steve. What´s your favourite colour?
Red, green, yellow or blue? What´s your favourite

colour?
Red, green, yellow or blue? What´s your favourite

colour?
I like green. I like green. I like green.

Green´s my favourite colour.
Do you like green? Oh yes I do!

I like green. Green´s my favourite colour.
But do you like light or dark, light or dark,

like or dark green?
Light or dark, light or dark, light or dark

green?
I like dark green. Dark green. Dark green

is my favourite colour.
Silly Steve, what´s your favourite colour?

Red, green, yellow or blue? What´s your favourite
colour?

Red, green, yellow or blue? What´s your favourite
colour?

O-oh, I don´t know. I like all the colours.
What´s your favourite colour?
